author: Home Repair Tutor
description: How to waterproof shower outside corners…I applied Schluter ALL-SET using 5-inch and 12-inch joint compound knives. They I used the KERDI trowel and embedded KERDI membrane which extends at least 2 inches beyond the screws & washers, This is just one way to waterproof an outside corner. Many thanks to Schluter for providing the materials for my client’s shower renovation. For more shower remodeling tips and complete step-by-step tutorials visit https://homerepairtutor.com 🔥#showerremodel #schlutersystems #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: How to Waterproof Shower Outside Corners - #shorts #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
